Trade/Device Name(s): Chemtrue Single/Multi-Panel Drug Screen Cassette and Dip Card Tests
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Chemtrue Single/Multi-Panel Drug Screen Cassette and Dip Card Tests for qualitative detection of six drugs of abuse in urine by lateral flow immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid lateral flow immunoassays for qualitative detection of up to six drugs (benzodiazepines, barbiturates, ecstasy, methadone, opiates, oxycodone) in human urine for in vitro diagnostic and prescription use only; provides preliminary results requiring confirmatory testing.
